topics.name: Background

questions.question: Who are you and what do you do?

questions.question: Can you give me some advice?
questions.transcript: Study hard and get into a good college.

utterances.question: Please look at the camera for 30 seconds without speaking. Try to remain in the same position.
Please give a short introduction of yourself, which includes your name, current job, and title.
utterances.transcript: My name is Clint Anderson and I'm a Nuclear Electrician's Mate in the Navy. I studied Computer Science at USC.
